question.question: In septic shock, which of the following is the primary goal of management?
question.option_a: To maintain blood pressure through fluid resuscitation alone
question.option_b: To administer antibiotics to target the underlying infection
question.option_c: To ensure adequate oxygenation and perfusion of vital organs
question.option_d: To support cardiovascular function through inotropic agents
